# Adam Conover

*Revision ID: 1156953007 | Timestamp: 2023-05-25T12:13:23Z*

---

}}

**Adam Conover** is an American comedian, writer, voice actor, television host, and labor organizer. He created and [hosted](Television presenter) the half-hour [truTV](truTV) show *[Ruins Everything](Adam)(Adam Ruins Everything)*, based on the [CollegeHumor](CollegeHumor) series of the same name. He was also the host of the American version of *[Crystal Maze](The)(The Crystal Maze)* on Nickelodeon. In 2022, Conover's limited series *[G Word with Adam Conover](The)(The G Word with Adam Conover)* debuted on [Netflix](Netflix). Conover currently serves on the board of the [Guild of America West](Writers)(Writers Guild of America West).

## Early life

[[File:Olde english comedy.png|thumb|left|Members of the sketch comedy group Olde English. From left to right: Ben Popik, [Bob-Waksberg](Raphael)(Raphael Bob-Waksberg), David Segal, Caleb Bark, and Adam Conover]]

Adam Conover was born in [New York](Smithtown,)(Smithtown, New York), and grew up in [River](Wading)(Wading River, New York). His parents are [O. Conover](David)(David O. Conover), a marine biologist, and Margaret Conover (n√©e Howard), a [botanist](botanist). His younger sister, [Conover](Emily)(Emily Conover), is a science reporter who holds a PhD in [physics](particle)(particle physicist). His parents' and sibling's degrees led Conover to humorously describe himself as "the only member of the family without a [Ph.D.](Ph.D.)"

In 2000, he graduated from [River High School](Shoreham-Wading)(Shoreham-Wading River High School), where he became interested in the performing arts. As a teenager, he was part of a band called Bocoach. He then attended [College](Bard)(Bard College), where, in 2002, he became an active member of the [comedy](sketch)(sketch comedy) group [English](Olde)(Olde English (sketch comedy)). In 2004, he earned a [degree](bachelor's)(bachelor's degree) in philosophy from Bard College.

## Career

In 2012, Conover began working as a sketch [comedy](comedy) writer and performer for the comedy website and YouTube channel [CollegeHumor](CollegeHumor), where he eventually created the web series that would go on to become *[Ruins Everything](Adam)(Adam Ruins Everything)* on [TruTV](TruTV). The first episode of the TruTV show, which aims to reveal untold t

... [9058 chars truncated] ...

ies about the federal government called *The G Word with Adam Conover*. The show premiered on Netflix on May 19, 2022.

Conover serves on the board of the [Guild of America West](Writers)(Writers Guild of America West), and sits on the 2023 WGA contract negotiating committee. On May 1, 2023 the WGA contract negotiating committee failed to reach a satisfactory agreement with the [of Motion Picture and Television Producers](Alliance)(Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers) (AMPTP), which represents [major film](the)(Major film studios) and [studios](television)(Big Three (American television)) of [Hollywood](Cinema of the United States), [a strike](triggering)(2023 Writers Guild of America strike)

### Television

## Personal life

Conover was once a roommate of *[Horseman](BoJack)(BoJack Horseman)* creator [Bob-Waksberg](Raphael)(Raphael Bob-Waksberg) in [York City](New)(New York City), who also introduced him to his girlfriend, illustrator [Hanawalt](Lisa)(Lisa Hanawalt). Conover [drinking](quit)(Teetotalism) in early 2018.

### Activism

Conover has been an outspoken supporter of [Raman](Nithya)(Nithya Raman), who challenged and beat [Ryu](David)(David Ryu) for the [Angeles City Council](Los)(Los Angeles City Council). As an activist for Housing First policies, Conover performed stand-up to fundraise for the campaign and canvassed in support of Raman.[The Comedy Bureau - "Comedy for the City: A Fundraiser for Nithya Raman"](https://thecomedybureau.com/shows/comedy-for-the-city-a-fundraiser-for-nithya-raman-twitch-live-stream/)
